channel.title: Scrollbar
channel.description: My quest tab does not display a scroll bar. I've looked through Rsinterface, etc to see if it might be commented out somewhere, but it's not. Does anybody know where, or how I could add the scroll bar to the quest tab? 317 PI

item.title: Scrollbar
item.dc:creator: @1_2_3_4_KOED 1 2 3 4 KOED
item.description:
@1_2_3_4_KOED wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:550952”]Well… I don’t see where you added that code, but I see this:

list.width = 168; list.height = 225; // list.scrollMax = 1320;
In the questTab method.

You need to un comment the scroll max.[/quote]

Done, but sadly no luck

Read full topic

item.title: Scrollbar
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Well… I don’t see where you added that code, but I see this:

list.width = 168; list.height = 225; // list.scrollMax = 1320;
In the questTab method.

You need to un comment the scroll max.

Read full topic

scroll.scrollMax = 550;

item.title: Scrollbar
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

It looks like your custom interfaces are loaded from a file called “CustomInterfaces”.
So you should take a look in there for it, because I’m not really seeing any interfaces loaded from RsInterface.

Read full topic

item.description:

I did not set the scroll values, or set the scroll bar. I’ve been trying to find a tutorial that could help, but no luck so far.

in your RSInterface did you set the scroll values, and set that the scrollbar is actually there?
